attributes.action: look at why the Faster Payments service is not uniform and is largely dysfunctional.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Faster Payments service has been running for 12+ months now and it appears some banks are still not subscribed to it. Further, those that are, often impose miniscule daily limits on payments/transfers out, in some cases as little as £10. Alliance & Leicester, now part of Santander impose a daily limit of just £250 currently. I want the UK government to look at this siuation with a view to requiring all banks to offer a uniform service now. I would also like to see each institution publishing the details of its daily limits for Faster Payments on its respective website clearly.
